column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis MSc teaches the fundamental concepts of immunology through research-led teaching from internationally renowned experts. We bring together clinical and research expertise in translational immunology to focus on experimental medicine and therapeutic approaches. Based at the world-leading Institute of Immunity and Transplantation, you will receive excellent preparation for a research career and develop valuable transferable skills.About this degreeThis MSc Experimental and Translational Immunology provides insight into state-of-the-art immunology research, current issues in immunity, immune dysfunction, and immune-based therapeutic approaches.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
